hints.content:
First, we need to find $36$ cm on the number line.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1ea7159fa0060d9c668e49a40a3957e345addfc2)

Each dot represents one reptile. 

So, we need to count all of the dots on the line plot that represent lengths longer than $36$ cm.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3ab034ab1f8ac4af90cc440e6df9521755da049d)

There are $\blueE6$ dots that represent lengths longer than $36$ cm.   

$\blueE6$ reptiles are longer than $36$ cm.

question.content:
The lengths of different reptiles are shown below.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/943eabd5b355e47ee527c5c06a336a51a64e228b)

**How many reptiles are longer than $36$ centimeters?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] reptiles
